Ext.slider.Single Example

Tags:

  • Ext JS
  • Ext JS 4.1.0
  • Ext.slider.Single
[example]

See Also:

  • Ext.slider.Single Documentation
© 2012 Sencha Inc. 
/*global Ext:false */
Ext.onReady(function() {
    Ext.create('Ext.slider.Single', {
        width: 200,
        value: 50,
        increment: 10,
        minValue: 0,
        maxValue: 100,
        renderTo: Ext.getBody()
    });
});
